user_query: I am starting a new business and I need to create a logo. Can you suggest some popular color combinations and fonts that are commonly used in logo design? Also, provide me with a list of graphic designers or design agencies that I can hire for my logo creation. Additionally, recommend some online platforms where I can create my own logo.

TaskList.description: Research popular color combinations and fonts used in logo design.
Compile a list of graphic designers or design agencies available for hire.
Recommend online platforms that allow users to create their own logos.
